name: Clock Display
details: A Java project that makes a digital clock display out of 96 analog clocks.

name: Resource Pack Generator
details: Generate a themed resource pack for any version of Minecraft using Python.

name: Pygame Basic API
details: This allows the user to easily interface with pygame and write their own games with ease.

name: Mandelbrot Set Generator
details: This JavaScript program generates the Mandelbrot Set with the given parameters.

name: Maze Solver
details: This is a visual representation of how mazes can be traversed using various path-finding algorithms.

name: iOS Math Game
details: This is a rudimentary math game application that focuses on addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

name: Bank Management System
details: This is a command-line bank management system implemented using C.
